item.description:
One of the most elegant places for an evening cocktail is the Museum of Fine Art. Enjoy live music outside in the Calderwood Courtyard.

Music by DJ Deja

Free admission for MFA Members
Otherwise, Free with Museum admission ($17.00)

Note: Every Wednesday from 4-9:45 pm admission is free (voluntary donations welcome); Guests also are entitled to one free repeat visit within ten days.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be outside the side entrance (5:15-45); Renoir pinned to my jacket pocket.
item.name: MFA Summer Fridays: Dancing & Art
